name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 45: The Block Kuzushi 2
overview: Block Kuzushi 2 is a breakout-style game that can be played by one player through a series of levels, or by two players in cooperative or VS modes. The sequel to Block Kuzushi, both of these games were re-released as part of the Simple 1500 series of budget titles. This game was later used as the base engine for the European game Block Buster, although with different graphics and a completely different set of levels.
